about_the_game:
Introducing Star Armada an engaging auto-battler strategy game where you forge your ultimate armada of capital spaceships and lead them into epic battles against formidable foes. Experience dynamic gameplay as you unlock powerful upgrades, turrets, and abilities with each playthrough, and test your strategic prowess in this immersive journey through the cosmos.

In Star Armada you'll navigate the vast expanse of space, discovering new challenges and opportunities as you assemble your fleet. Customize your capital ships with a wide array of weapons, engines, shields, and special abilities, and prepare to face procedurally generated missions that keep the gameplay fresh and exhilarating.

  • Build and Customize Your Fleet: Assemble an armada of capital spaceships, each customizable with unique modules, upgrades, and abilities to match your playstyle and strategy.
  • Dynamic Auto-Battler Combat: Witness thrilling, automated space battles where your strategic choices and ship customizations determine the outcome.
  • Unleash Unique Abilities: You can turn the odds of victory in your favour by activating powerful abilities at the right time, giving you an edge in influencing a battle you normally have no control on.
  • Procedurally Generated Missions: Embark on semi-generated missions, ensuring a fresh and balanced experience with every playthrough.
  • Realistic scales: allowing for hundreds of fighters to be on screen while capital ships face each other in an epic encounter.
  • Smart AI: Squadrons of fighters fly together in formation. Turrets have predictive aiming and target priority matrices to fill out specific roles. You do not need to configure complex AI parameters to have a working armada, everything works out of the box so you can dive in the action.
  • Resource Management: Balance crew, mass, and energy as you equip your ships with reactors, engines, turrets, and more, creating strategic trade-offs and enhancing your fleet's performance.
  • Diverse Battlefields and Dynamic Events: Navigate hazardous environments, such as asteroid fields and nebulas, and encounter random events that can alter the course of battle.
  • Persistent Progression: Retain progression across playthroughs by unlocking new ships, turrets, and upgrades that become available in future runs, giving you each time the opportunity to grow a more powerful armada.

planned Feature

  • Persistance of damages: to reinforce the survival side of the game as you are fleeing an overwhelming force and the odds are against you.
  • Bigger armada: Currently the game allow up to 3 capital ships for the player, that number should grow to 7.
  • Drag-and-drop ship editor: We will revamp the ship editor for better usability.
  • Debris: Ships will have more realistic destruction sequences that leave debris on the battlefield.
  • Scrap system: scrap (the in-game currency) will need to be harvested from the battlefield and asteroids by automated drones. Giving more depth to the game economy.
  • Steam achievements: Needless to describe.

Get ready to command your star armada, make tough strategic decisions, and survive the odds in "Star Armada" Are you prepared to face the challenges that await in the vast reaches of space?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or other shader model 4.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run similar Unity 2D games, you likely can run this one.

short_description: Star Armada is a spaceship auto-battler where you assemble and command a fleet of capital ships and fighter squadrons. Unlock powerful new ships and outfit them with a range of turrets, energy shields, and starfighter hangars. Engage in automated battles, carefully timing unique abilities to win.
